fields.name: Trial
fields.description: Use this plan to get a full day access to all our GYMs.
fields.text: At MotiGym, you have a huge range of membership options you can chose from –  starting from a single-day trial. All memberships are designed to provide you with everything you need to achieve your personal fitness, weight loss, and body-shaping goals Membership also includes full access to massive rage of relaxation and sporting facilities including swimming pools, tennis, squash, junior fitness facilities and oner 2,500 fitness classes month.

fields.name: Regular
fields.description: Get monthly access to your local GYM for only 20€!
